Subject: Deduplication with Heritrix 1.12
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=270755834

Hello

I'm testing Heritrix 1.12 because i'm interested in dedup feature.

I read on wiki notes on using the new duplication-reduction functionality.

What's the difference betwen use PersistLogProcessor or 
PersistStoreProcessor?

I try both to get the initial crawl using my www as example and it woks 
ok (getting about 700Mb on arc files). But when i recrawl, the size of 
arc created with crawl data is similar to the initial ( the web has few 
changes but also crawl 700Mb )

Thanks

N.
